name: Nahera
description:
Nahera is a desert warrior whose only offensive weapon is a shield.

This project, «Nahera», is a combat prototype in which you will need to fight for as long as you can.

If your defense breaks, you'll lose your shield and won't be able to attack for a while. However, you deal more damage when your defense is low so you'll need to find the right balance.

Thanks to Derek for the music and Deconstructeam for their support.

Note that this is not a fleshed out game but a prototype we developed to try new things out and help us transitioning from ue4 to ue5, so expect some bugs and rough edges. Despite this, we hope you find it interesting!
